Why I design from research first

2 February 2026

Post content here.

Research isn't a phase—it's the foundation. Every product I design starts with understanding who will use it and what they actually need, not what we assume. User interviews, contextual inquiry, and usability testing shape the entire journey from problem to solution.

When we skip research, we build in the dark. When we put it first, we build with confidence.
